Chris is one focused, driven and dedicated Entrepreneur whom is poised to make a disruptive mark in the multi billion dollar pet industry. His ability to fund his business, take the methodical approach of a business master and develop the focused relationships he has is a key testament to his vision. It is a pleasure to know Chris, have consulted with him and continue to share relationships that make an impact.If looking to work with Chris, without a doubt, do not hesitate to know he is an action taker, problem solver and focused creator! It will be a valuable connection and new friendship for you.

May 5, 2016, Chris was a client of Janet‚Äôs

My name is Chris Nero, I am the FOUNDER/CEO of PET WATER THIRSTYPET. I must say I was compelled to write this review do to excellent service given to I and my company. Ms. Perez has to be one of the hardest working professionals i've encountered in a long long time. Ms. Perez has been professional, efficient in many facets such as, very simply answering the phone, always being a strong communicator which I find very refreshing in this day and time. She was proactive in requesting particulars that were either requested or anticipated by Ms. Perez. When our company got denied Ms. Perez did not give up. She was continually searching for other avenues for my company. Ms. Perez it seemed to me was a person who would exhaust all remedies. In closing you may think that we were successful but on the contrary, we were not able to succeed. However I must say the experience with such a professional in a day and time when that quality is hard to find I highly recommend Ms. Perez to anyone who is looking for a person who looks for results for your company, I believe she would do all she can to exhaust all remedies for your company. A very refreshing experience for me. A++ From me Ms. Perez. Thank you Chris Nero. FOUNDER/CEO PET WATER LLC

Brandon and i met a few weeks ago. I came to Brandon to ask about his expertise, I must say that I have been pleasantly surprised. Not only has Brandon been able to help me in my business but has gone above and beyond. Brandon has lead me to a business path that I believe has put my business on its way straight to the top. Brandon has been professional and what i would like to believe I now consider as a friend. not only has Brandon been there for me on weekdays but weekends as well. In closing I would recommend Brandon to any business associates who are seeking excellence Thanks Brandon.
